function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased dependence on the Internet due to COVID-19","Impact":"Potential loss of in-person social interactions leading to mental health issues and decreased community resilience","Mitigation":"Promote safe in-person interactions, mental health awareness, and community building initiatives","Technologies":"Community-building platforms, telemedicine, virtual mental health services","People":"Global Internet users, urban residents","Owner":"Governments, community organizations, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Proliferation of 'non-contact' interaction","Impact":"Reduced physical contact leading to decreased immunity to contagious diseases and potential increase in transmission","Mitigation":"Encourage balanced interaction, hygiene practices, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Hygiene monitoring systems, contact-tracing apps, immune system support technologies","People":"Urban residents, workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Health authorities, employers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Rapid growth of Internet users in China","Impact":"Exponential increase in online activity leading to cybersecurity and privacy risks","Mitigation":"Cybersecurity education, privacy regulations, secure online infrastructure","Technologies":"Cybersecurity tools, encryption technologies, privacy-enhancing technologies","People":"Chinese Internet users, online businesses, government entities","Owner":"Government, cybersecurity experts, online service providers"}]}
